description: This Dart source file implements the HomePage widget for a Flutter notes application. It includes the user interface for displaying a list of notes, searching, and creating or editing notes via a floating action button and navigation to a note editor.

classes.name: HomePage
classes.description: Main widget representing the homepage displaying a list of notes with search functionality and a floating action button to add new notes.

classes.name: _HomePageState
classes.description: State class managing the internal state of HomePage, including search toggling, note loading, and navigation to the note editor.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes state and loads notes after the widget is inserted into the tree.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of the search controller when the widget is removed from the tree.

methods.name: _toggleSearch
methods.description: Toggles the search mode on or off, clearing the search query when closing.

methods.name: _openEditor
methods.description: Navigates to the note editor page to create or edit a note, and shows a snackbar upon return.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the homepage, including search bar, note list, and FAB.
